entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clarification on Supported use of RegisterForPostInitialization #63501

Closed

  • VS suffix variable name with "Attribute" when renaming a variable #63499
  • Use keyword color for u8 suffix for UTF8 literals #63139
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Incremental Generators docs update #63500
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move Windows builds to new images #63498
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Filter out `RequiredMemberAttribute` from metadata symbols #63497
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #63496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Remove unused argument #63454
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Classify 'u8' in Utf8 string literals as keyword #63381
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63507
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/ConvertToRecord #63506
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #63505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #63504
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #63503
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63502
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve cross-project add-using results #63449
    Area-IDE
  • Move symbol-cache incremental-analyzer out of oop. #63438
    Area-IDE
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • IDE0220 (foreach cast): Consider T of IEnumerable<T> for weakly-typed GetEnumerator #63472
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support changing return types of methods #63486
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Specify targets when loading MSBuildWorkspace #61391
    Area-IDE
